data.name: Commercial Loan
data.description: Our offering for Equipment and Vehicle finance needs with options to take loan to help your business take the next step

features.additionalInfo: Existing Westpac Equipment and Vehicle finance customers may qualify for fast approval.

Equipment and Vehicle finance product - Commercial Loan available with Minimum finance amount of $15,000 and terms from 1 to 7 years. Finance could be structured over the life expectancy of the asset.
Get certainty with fixed interest rate on a commercial loan.
Negotiate flexible payment terms to suit your expected cash flow and budget - monthly, quarterly, half-yearly, annually or structured as negotiated
Based on your choice of business finance option you could benefit from ongoing tax benefits
Balloon payment for commercial loan is available.

With Commercial Loan product you source and own the asset and we provide a loan secured by the asset. You own the asset and we hold it as security. The interest on the finance and depreciation of the asset are generally both tax deductible.
Extended tax write-offs : With the Federal Budget announcement on Temporary Full Expensing, you may be able to deduct the full cost of eligible business equipment or vehicles
Payments via Direct Debit or invoicing

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalValue: This Fee is appliable when the amount financed is less that $420,000

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalValue: This fee is applicable when the amount financed is greater than $420,000. The total fee applicable is 0.1% of the financed amount and $30.

fees.name: Aircraft - Register Cape Town Security
fees.additionalValue: Applies for each registration of Security on the International Register and payable by you on or before the settlement date when this type of security is required for financed aircraft The AUD amount will be quoted to you as part of the settlement documentation where it applies. (I.e. Quote and Details)

fees.name: Aircraft - De-register Cape Town Security
fees.additionalValue: Applies each time we are required to remove a security registration from the International Register and payable by you on or before the date of removal. The AUD amount will be quoted to you before being charged.

fees.name: Aircraft - CASA Transfer of Ownership
fees.additionalValue: Applies each time there is/will be a transfer of ownership with the Civil Aviation Safety Authority (CASA) and payable by you on or before the date of transfer.

fees.name: Aircraft - RAA Transfer of Ownership
fees.additionalValue: Applies for each registration of a marine vessel with the Australian Maritime Safety Authority and payable by you on or before the settlement date when this type of security is required

fees.name: Marine - Vessel Registration less than 24metres
fees.additionalValue: Applies for each registration of a marine vessel with the Australian Maritime Safety Authority and payable by you on or before the settlement date when this type of security is required

fees.name: Substitution fee
fees.additionalValue: Applicable for the substitution of Equipment and/or Guarantors and payable by you on or before the date of substitution

fees.name: Assignment
fees.additionalValue: Applicable for the assignment of Goods Loan products to a third party and payable by you on or before the date of the assignment

fees.name: Early Termination
fees.additionalValue: Applicable when you terminate your Goods Loan, Lease or Hire Purchase early.

fees.name: Arrears Fee
fees.additionalValue: Applicable each time a payment is not received within 15 days of its due date and is in addition to any overdue amount owing

fees.name: Overdue interest
fees.additionalValue: This charge applies on overdue amount from the time it?s due until it?s paid.

fees.name: Progress Payment Facility - Notice Fee
fees.additionalValue: Charged for each progress payment made on a Progress Payment Facility and is payable by you at the time of each progress payment.
